hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. This policy explains how Split handles your data with complete transparency.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: Split is part of Switch-to.eu, a European initiative building privacy-first digital tools. We're committed to creating bill-splitting software that respects your privacy through end-to-end encryption and zero-knowledge architecture.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.subtitle: We collect only the minimum data necessary:

groupData.title: Group Information
groupData.description: Group names, member names, and expense details you provide when using Split

technicalData.title: Technical Information
technicalData.description: Basic server logs for security and performance monitoring (no personal identification)

noData.title: What We Don't Collect
noData.description: No email addresses, no IP tracking, no behavioral analytics, no advertising profiles, no cookies for tracking

encryption.title: Client-Side Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted in your browser using AES-256-GCM before transmission.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledge.description: The encryption key never reaches our servers. We cannot decrypt or access your data.

automatic.title: Automatic Deletion
automatic.description: All group data is automatically deleted 90 days after creation.

immediate.title: Immediate Deletion
immediate.description: Group creators can delete their groups instantly using the admin link.

privacy.title: Privacy Questions
privacy.description: For privacy-related questions, contact us through the Switch-to.eu platform.

summary.title: Privacy Summary
points: No accounts or email addresses required

hero.title: About Split
hero.subtitle: The privacy-first alternative to Splitwise. Split bills fairly without sacrificing your privacy.

features.title: Why Split?
features.subtitle: All the features you need, none of the tracking you don't.

unified.title: Unified Payback
unified.description: Our debt simplification algorithm minimizes the number of transactions. Instead of complex webs of IOUs, get simple who-pays-whom instructions.

instant.title: Instant Setup
instant.description: Create a group in seconds. Share a link. Done. No accounts, no email verification.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Everyone sees new expenses instantly. No refreshing needed.

private.title: Truly Private
private.description: End-to-end encrypted. We literally cannot see your expenses.

platform.title: Part of Switch-to.eu
platform.description: Split is proudly part of the Switch-to.eu initiative — building European digital tools that put your privacy first.

cta.title: Ready to split some bills?
cta.description: No signup required. Create a group and start splitting in seconds.
